Nested.title: Models are nested
Nested.description: Models are ordered in least to most specific. If unsure, assume that they are not.

Shapes.title: Shapes to test
Shapes.description: See README for full description. Possible shapes include cei, con, con_cei, dec, dec_cei, inc, inc_cei, ius, ius_cei. The model always includes unrestricted.

Tests.title: Tests
Tests.description: Total number of tests and positive tests on a unique day.

Ceil.title: Ceiling
Ceil.description: Sets the ceilieng for the relevant shape constraints

Lag.title: Lag
Lag.description: Permits comparisons across proportions more than this number of days apart

Seed.title: Seed
Seed.description: Sets a seed for the purposes of replication. Leave as 0 for a random seed.

nsim.title: Number of simulations
nsim.description: Number of bootstrap replications to be generated
